description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this hierarchy record.
Identifier of the hierarchy/list this node belongs to, supporting multiple trees (e.g., assets, organization).
Identifier of the underlying source object represented by this node (e.g., vehicle, asset group, site); links to the original entity.
Boolean flag indicating whether this node is visible in user interfaces or reports.
Likely stores serialized configuration or form metadata associated with the node; confirm with SME.
User account that created the record for audit and ownership tracking.
Date/time the record was created for auditing and change history.
User account that last updated the record for audit tracking.
Date/time the record was last updated for auditing and change history.
